title: 'Very bad Bluetooth connection'
body: Very bad Bluetooth connection. It's good in first 3-4 days, but after that it's function gets deteriorated. In the time of plugging, i can't hear the sound of media files. Very bad experience. Waste of money

title: 'Great Speakers Boat.'
body: I've been using them for about an hour and I'm absolutely amazed by the Boat Stone 352. It's more than loud for its size and has a good bass response. The bass does get muddled at max volume and I'd recommend not running bass heavy songs on this speaker at the max volume. It's an awesome purchase and there is no competition at the price point. Great to see an Indian brand making such great speakers that can rival foreign brands.üôåüèΩ

title: Totally dissapointed with the brand name 'boat' product
body: I purchased it after seeing the brand name. But I am bound to say what disastrous decision I have made. I have to send it three times to customer service. Still, I am having a problem. The demerit of this speaker is the Bluetooth cannot be connected to the laptop. It only connects with the mobile. So if you are a heavy user of a laptop like me, please don't go for it.
